#include <stdio.h>
#include<math.h>

int main(void) {
	long long int number,x;
	long long int ans,temp,j;
	ans=1;
	temp=1;
	long long int tempo=1;
	scanf("%lld",&number);
	x=number;
	
	while(number%2==0)
			{
				tempo=tempo*2;
				temp+=tempo;
				number=number/2;
				
			}
			ans*=temp;
			
			for(j=3;j<=sqrt(number);j=j+2)
			{
				temp=1;
				tempo=1;
				while(number%j==0)
				{
					printf("%lld ",j);
					tempo*=j;
					temp+=temp;
					number=number/j;
				}
				ans*=temp;
			}
			
			if(number>2)
			{
				temp=1;
				tempo=number;
				temp=1+tempo;
				ans*=temp;
			}
			ans=ans-x;
			printf("%lld",ans);
	return 0;
}
